text:
Hi everyone, This is Shivanshu, a sophomore at IIT Kanpur. I've used julia in the past, actually explored it because i wanted to learn some cool new language XD. Now, I'd like to take my chance contributing to it. I'm mostly interested in flux,jl
So, I was wondering if it's okay if i go ahead and try to implement some of the functions as stated in <https://github.com/FluxML/Flux.jl/issues/1431|1431>? I'm just starting out in the Julia Community, so I'd really appreciate if anyone can guide me.
Thanks in advance.
